game.name: You Are Grounded
game.shortDescription: "You Are Grounded" is a short psychological horror-slasher game from a first-person perspective. A terrifying killer clown terrorizes a teenager and his family on Halloween Eve.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "You Are Grounded" is a short psychological horror-slasher game from a first-person perspective. A terrifying killer clown terrorizes a teenager and his family on Halloween Eve.

reviewHighlights.text: This was a really good game the graphics were good and so was the storyline. I will definitely be recommending this game to others
